original: Öman, Aron, kyrkoherde, Tidaholm, f. 5/8/83 i Öra, Älvsb. 1., av Johan August Ö. o. Klara Larson. G. 16 m. Signe Wiberg. Barn: Gunnar f. 17, stadsnot., Bengt 20, köpm., Hans 20, försäkr :tj :man, Ingrid 22, sjuksköt., Sven 231, kont. — Stud:ex. 04, teol. fil. ex. 05, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov, folkskoll :ex. o. prästv. 08. E. o. präst i Undenäs 09, vakanskommin. i Dala 12, kommin. i Algutstorp 12 i Falköping 17, las :pred. 18, lär. v. sam-sk. där 20-25, kommin. i Annedal i Gbg 25, kyrkoh. i Tidaholm, Acklinge, Agnetorp o. Baltak fr. 29. Stiftsomb. f. diak:styr. 15, f. miss:styr. 21. Led. av Tidah. stadsfullm. 30-36, v. ordf. i folksk :styr., ordf. i Tidah.-Agnetorps kyrkofullm., i Tidah. past. kyrkostämma. Insp. f. samrealsk. fr. 32. Skr.: Ur Undenäs historia. LVO.
translated:
Öman, Aron, vicar, Tidaholm, b. 5/8/83 in Öra, Älvsborg county, son of Johan August Ö. and Klara Larson. Married in 1916 to Signe Wiberg. Children: Gunnar b. 1917, notary, Bengt b. 1920, merchant, Hans b. 1920, insurance agent, Ingrid b. 1922, nurse, Sven b. 1923, clerk. 

Education: Passed student examination in 1904, philosophy and theology degree in 1905, theology candidate, practical theological examination, elementary school teacher examination, and ordained as a priest in 1908. 

Career: Assistant priest in Undenäs from 1909, temporary curate in Dala from 1912, curate in Algutstorp from 1912, and in Falköping from 1917. Auxiliary preacher in 1918, teacher at the social school in Falköping from 1920 to 1925, curate in Annedal in Gothenburg from 1925, and vicar in Tidaholm, Acklinge, Agnetorp, and Baltak from 1929. Appointed diocese delegate for the diaconal board in 1915 and for the missionary board in 1921. 

Positions: Member of the Tidaholm city council from 1930 to 1936, vice chairman of the elementary school board, chairman of the Tidaholm-Agnetorp church board, and Tidaholm parish church assembly. Inspector of the secondary school from 1932. Written work: "From the History of Undenäs". Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (LVO).
